name: Mrs. Ann Hopkins v. Braddock Borough, Appellant

judges: Before Steerett, C. J., Green, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: Mrs. Ann Hopkins v. Braddock Borough, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Green,
The judgment in this case is affirmed for the reasons stated in the opinion just filed in the case of William Bowers v. The Borough of Braddock, No. 64, Oct. T., 1895.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Green,

casebody.head_matter:
Mrs. Ann Hopkins v. Braddock Borough, Appellant.
Argued. Oct. 29, 1895.
Appeal, No. 71, Oct. T., 1895, by defendant, from order of O. P. No. 3, Allegheny Co., Aug. T., 1894, No. 490, dismissing exceptions to report of viewers and refusing to allow defendant an appeal.
Before Steerett, C. J., Green, Williams, McCollum, Mitchell, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
January 6, 1896 :
